article.bdy:
Trikorfo (Τρίκορφο) is a community administration center in
Messenia
,
Greece . Population 1,037 (2001).Trikorfo belongs to Messinia prefecture.The altitude of Trikorfo village is about 400 meters. It is famous place because of the extra quality of olives.The seat of the community is Trikorfo.Predominantly a farming region, the principal exports include kalamata olives ,olive oil and figs.The community is divided in Trikorfo,Mavros Logkos,Chilia Spitia,Draina Klima,Koromilea,Palaiokastro,Kinigos .Trikorfo village is also known as Pentias.
